projects.description1: Garage sale app where you can buy and sell used goods. You can check with the owner about products via WhatsApp. Created with React and Tailwind CSS.
projects.smartPocketBackendDescription: REST API powering inventory and sales management for small businesses. Manages products, categories and user authentication. Currently in production with an active client.
projects.smartPocketFrontendDescription: Web interface for product visualization and management. Features admin panel with full CRUD, public catalog with search, filters and WhatsApp integration for customer inquiries.
projects.permitManagementDescription: Digital management system for work-at-heights permits in occupational safety. Creates permits, captures digital signatures, generates PDF documents and tracks status (pending/completed).
projects.zetinoxWebsiteDescription: Implementation of a corporate WordPress website for Zetinox, highlighting product presentation, fully responsive design, and optimization for content self-management.
